statements.query: MATCH (n:GKECluster) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP GKE Clusters that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GKECluster)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GKECluster-to-Project relationships that are out of date.
